title: Dependency Management - Updating the included dependency
author: simonai1254
body_snippet:
As noted in various other issues (e.g., #2027, #2099), mRemoteNG needs a dependency management to keep track of and update external dependencies shipped with the mRemoteNG installer. Namely this affects at least the following components:

 - PuttyNG
 - Log4Net

A solution needs to be put in place to make sure the dependencies are updated on a regular interval and new builds are created shipping the new versions.

Not affected is the .NET desktop runtime framework as this is an external re...

comments.snippet: Already implemented, new build will be trigered by Github Actions and updated as separate release
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
> Already implemented, new build will be trigered by Github Actions and updated as separate release

Are new PuttyNG Releases also created automatically when a new PuTTY version is released?
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: semi automaticaly, due for security its need to be signed with certificate and what cant be integrated curently into GitHub Actions, but technicaly its all scripted so just need resulting file manualy sing before re-add to distribution
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.3
comments.author: robertpopa22

comments.snippet:
